offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to regulation 7(1)(a) of the Public Service Vehicles (Conduct of Drivers, Inspectors, Conductors and Passengers) Regulations 1990 and section 25 of the Public Passenger Vehicles Act 1981.
offences.offenceTitle: Public service vehicle - passenger use altered / defaced   ticket
offences.wording: On 02/07/2018 at Bond street, being a passenger on a vehicle, namely Volvo B9TL 30x, used for the carriage of passengers at separate fares, used a ticket which had been altered or defaced.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 366(8)(a) and (9) of the Communications Act 2003.
offences.offenceTitle: Obstruct person executing search warrant for TV receiver
offences.wording: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford intentionally obstructed a person authorised by the BBC in the exercise of a power conferred by virtue of a search warrant issued under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by Chelmsford Magistrates Court on 25/10/2017
offences.wordingWelsh: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford intentionally obstructed a person authorised by the BBC in the exercise of a power conferred by virtue of a search warrant issued under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by Chelmsford Magistrates Court on 25/10/2017

type.applicationLegislation: In accordance with Part 2 of Schedule 8 to the Criminal Justice Act 2003.
type.applicationType: Failing to comply with the requirements of a community order
